name: Theseus: Journey to Athens
description: Adventure through Classical Antiquity as Theseus.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 2000 and up. Processor: Any modern Intel/AMD processor Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Intel Graphics Card sufficient Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: Not necessary unless you want to use sound. Additional Notes: Low requirements; 2D game made in GMS 2.
